name: Hanin Elias
description:
'''Hanin Elias''' (born 31 May 1972) is a [[Syrians in Germany|Syrian German]] [[industrial music|industrial]]/[[techno music|techno]] artist. She was a member of [[Atari Teenage Riot]] and is now a solo artist.

After Atari Teenage Riot's non-definitive break in 2000, and the subsequent death of [[Carl Crack]] from a [[drug overdose]], the members of ATR split up, and Elias set up her own record label, [[Fatal Recordings]].
